text:
County of Kings IT Department | Hanford, CA | Full-time | Onsite

The County of Kings IT Department is looking for an entry-level software developer to fill our Programmer Analyst I opening. We utilize the Microsoft stack (.NET Core, C#, Entity Framework Core, SQL Server) to build applications that keep the local government systems running, and provide our citizens with data, tools, and services.

Apply at: https://www.governmentjobs.com/careers/kingscounty/jobs/1806...
